@10:05 I believe the word you're looking for is "monochrome." The term "monotone" usually refers to sound, while the term "monochrome" is usually used with color. Sorry if I'm being a bit nitpicky, and hope this helps!

(Also, I really love the gradient and I think it turned out well. One thing I think you could do is add some sort of ruined walls/structures in the area around the path, to fill up some space and to give the base a bit of 'history' or 'lore.')
